tool_description: URL Shortener is a Node.js-based backend project that provides a simple and efficient way to shorten URLs and track click analytics. It offers a RESTful API for creating, managing, and accessing shortened URLs.
name: URLShortener
title: URLShortener

api_list.name: /api/urlShort/{shortCode}
api_list.description: Retrieves the original URL associated with a specific short code.

required_parameters.name: shortCode
required_parameters.description: The short code of the shortened URL.

api_list.name: /api/analytics/{shortCode}
api_list.description: Retrieves the analytics data for a specific shortened URL.

required_parameters.name: shortCode
required_parameters.description: The short code of the shortened URL.

ipAddress.description: IP address of the user who clicked the shortened URL.

userAgent.description: User agent string of the client.

api_list.name: /{shortCode}
api_list.description: Redirects the user to the original URL associated with the short code.

required_parameters.name: shortCode
required_parameters.description: The short code of the shortened URL.
